name: Adrift (shaynehayes)
description:
Adrift is a narrative-heavy action game created by Brody Richards, Freeman, Giovanni Benedetti, Kaylie Cetera, Raymond Reedy, and Shayne Hayes. Stranded on your way to Terra Novus, you and your crew must retrieve a lost beacon from the depths of space.

Adrift is part of the UCSC Games & Playable Media Collection.

Credits:

Brody Richards | Programmer, Writer

Freeman | Programmer, Level Designer

Giovanni Benedetti | Composer

Kaylie Cetera | Character & Environment Artist

Raymond Reedy | Space Artist, Writer

Shayne Hayes | Programmer, Producer
